name: Absolute Unit(Idle-Roguelite)
description:
Alpha Version 0.1 of Absolut Unit autobattler.

3 levels, endless battle. No way to know you won yet. 

You will get 3 choices of cards. If you have an armor, and your only choices are armors etc, the armor will change. This is the chaotic element that you sometimes are unlucky and have to trade items!

Controls: Mouse, press a card when they spawn every third enemy.

Feel free to comment on any bugs or ideas, critisism!

Also! if you want to make a weapon or enemy you may! just comment and i tell you what i need and i will add it to the game!

join the discord! https://discord.gg/qN2HQvxu
